title: Rückenschmerzen Literatur
description: ,- Dr. med. Heintze, Praxis für Ganzheitsmedizin Marburg,
text:
Literatur: Ganzheitsmedizinische Therapie bei chronischen Rückenschmerzen – über 30 Jahre Erfahrung in Theorie und Praxis – Teil I und II
Teil I
[Atalay, Nilgun Simsir; Sahin, Fusun; Atalay, Ali; Akkaya, Nuray (2013): Comparison of Efficacy of Neural Therapy and Physical Therapy in Chronic Low Back Pain. In ]African Journal of Traditional, Complementary, and Alternative Medicines 10 (3), pp. 431–435.
[Blackler, Rory W.; Gemici, Burcu; Manko, Anna; Wallace, John L. (2014): NSAID-gastroenteropathy: new aspects of pathogenesis and prevention. In ]Current opinion in pharmacology 19, pp. 11–16. DOI: 10.1016/j.coph.2014.05.008.
[Brady, Sharmayne R. E.; Mousa, Aya; Naderpoor, Negar; de Courten, Maximilian P. J.; Cicuttini, Flavia; Courten, Barbora de (2018): Adipsin Concentrations Are Associated with Back Pain Independently of Adiposity in Overweight or Obese Adults. In ]Front. Physiol. 9, p. 93. DOI: 10.3389/fphys.2018.00093.
[Cassuto J.; Sinclair R.; Bonderovic N. (2006): Anti-inflammatory properties of local anesthetics and their present and potential clinical implications. In ]Acta Anaesthesiologica Scandinavia 50, pp. 265–282.

In ]BMC complementary and alternative medicine 15, p. 200. DOI: 10.1186/s12906-015-0735-z.
[Finan, Patrick H.; Goodin, Burel R.; Smith, Michael T. (2013): The association of sleep and pain: an update and a path forward. In ]The journal of pain : official journal of the American Pain Society 14 (12), pp. 1539–1552. DOI: 10.1016/j.jpain.2013.08.007.
[Hernandez, C. J. (2017): The Microbiome and Bone and Joint Disease. In ]Current rheumatology reports 19 (12), p. 77. DOI: 10.1007/s11926-017-0705-1.
[Hilton, Lara; Hempel, Susanne; Ewing, Brett A.; Apaydin, Eric; Xenakis, Lea; Newberry, Sydne et al. (2017): Mindfulness Meditation for Chronic Pain: Systematic Review and Meta-analysis. In ]Annals of behavioral medicine : a publication of the Society of Behavioral Medicine 51 (2), pp. 199–213. DOI: 10.1007/s12160-016-9844-2.
[Li, Yukun; Gu, Simeng; Wang, Zhutao; Li, Hongfan; Xu, Xiayue; Zhu, Huan et al. (2019): Relationship Between Stressful Life Events and Sleep Quality: Rumination as a Mediator and Resilience as a Moderator. In ]Frontiers in psychiatry 10, p. 348. DOI: 10.3389/fpsyt.2019.00348.
[Markus W. Hollmann; Marcel E. Durieux (2000): Local Anesthetics and the Inflammatory Response: A New Therapeutic Indication? In ]Anesthesiology 93, pp. 858–875.

[Szychlinska, Marta Anna; Di Rosa, Michelino; Castorina, Alessandro; Mobasheri, Ali; Musumeci, Giuseppe (2019): A correlation between intestinal microbiota dysbiosis and osteoarthritis. In ]Heliyon 5 (1). DOI: 10.1016/j.heliyon.2019.e01134.
[van den Munckhof, I. C. L.; Kurilshikov, A.; Ter Horst, R.; Riksen, N. P.; Joosten, L. A. B.; Zhernakova, A. et al. ](2018): Role of gut microbiota in chronic low-grade inflammation as potential driver for atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease: a systematic review of human studies. In Obesity reviews : an official journal of the International Association for the Study of Obesity 19 (12), pp. 1719–1734. DOI: 10.1111/obr.12750.
[Weinschenk, Stefan (Ed.) (2010): Handbuch Neuraltherapie. Diagnostik und Therapie mit Lokalanästhetika ; mit Zugang zum Elsevier-Portal ; [mit dem Plus im Web ; Zugangscode im Buch. 1. ]Aufl. München: Elsevier Urban & Fischer.
[Weinschenk, Stefan; Mergenthaler, Caroline; Armstrong, Christina; Göllner, Richard; Hollmann, Markus W.; Strowitzki, Thomas (2017): Local Anesthetics, Procaine, Lidocaine, and Mepivacaine Show Vasodilatation but No Type 1 Allergy: A Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study. In ]BioMed Research International 2017. DOI: 10.1155/2017/9804693.
[Zamuner, Antonio Roberto; Barbic, Franca; Dipaola, Franca; Bulgheroni, Mara; Diana, Alessandro; Atzeni, Fabiola et al. (2015): Relationship between sympathetic activity and pain intensity in fibromyalgia. In ]Clinical and experimental rheumatology 33 (1 Suppl 88), S53-7.
Akupunktur-Studien:
Studien Akupunktur bei chronischen LWS-Schmerzen:
[Arch Intern Med.](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/17893311) 2007 Sep 24;167(17):1892-8.
German Acupuncture Trials (GERAC) for chronic low back pain: randomized, multicenter, blinded, parallel-group trial with 3 groups.

Dry needling for management of pain in the upper quarter and craniofacial region.
